00541         inline static QFontMetrics * getLastFontMetrics(const QFont & font)
00542         {
00543                 if(g_pLastFontMetrics)
00544                         return g_pLastFontMetrics;
00545                 g_pLastFontMetrics = new QFontMetrics(font);
00546                 unsigned short u;
00547                 for(u=1; u<32; u++)
00548                 {
00549                         QChar c = getSubstituteChar(u);
00550                         KviInputEditor::g_iInputFontCharWidth[u] = g_pLastFontMetrics->width(c);
00551                         if(c != QChar(u))
00552                                 KviInputEditor::g_iInputFontCharWidth[u] += 4;
00553                 }
00554 
00555                 for(u=32; u<256; u++)
00556                 {
00557                         KviInputEditor::g_iInputFontCharWidth[u] = g_pLastFontMetrics->width(QChar(u));
00558                 }
00559 
00560                 return g_pLastFontMetrics;
00561         }
